docs.snippet: Japan's core consumer prices rose for the first time in over a year in January thanks to a pickup in energy costs, but a slump in household spending showed why economic growth and inflation have lagged the more ambitious goals set out by policymak...
docs.lead_paragraph: Japan's core consumer prices rose for the first time in over a year in January thanks to a pickup in energy costs, but a slump in household spending showed why economic growth and inflation have lagged the more ambitious goals set out by policymakers.

headline.main: Japan Consumer Prices Rise for First Time in Year but BOJ Goal Still Distant

docs.snippet: After the battlefield of Iraq's Mosul, the next major campaign against the Islamic State group will be to take its de facto capital, the Syrian city of Raqqa. The Pentagon has drawn up a secret plan to do that, likely leaning on local allies with ...
docs.lead_paragraph: After the battlefield of Iraq's Mosul, the next major campaign against the Islamic State group will be to take its de facto capital, the Syrian city of Raqqa. The Pentagon has drawn up a secret plan to do that, likely leaning on local allies with stepped up American support.

headline.main: Rivals in Syria Race to Assault Militants' 'Capital' Raqqa
headline.print_headline: Rivals in Syria Race to Assault Militants' 'Capital' Raqqa

docs.snippet: The president of the film academy has sent an email to its members telling them they have much to be proud of after this year's Oscars ceremony, and reassuring them changes will be made to avoid a repeat of problems like the botched best-picture a...
docs.lead_paragraph: The president of the film academy has sent an email to its members telling them they have much to be proud of after this year's Oscars ceremony, and reassuring them changes will be made to avoid a repeat of problems like the botched best-picture announcement that closed the show.

headline.main: Film Academy President Reassures Members After Oscar Botch
headline.print_headline: Film Academy President Reassures Members After Oscar Botch
